text: Need Hayden Bell for Mad Mex campaign. Budget around $16,020, looking for 1 x Pinterest pin, 1 x Instagram post, 2 x Radio interview, 3 x 5-minute review, 1 x Social media takeover. 4 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 11 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
